price: ហើយយើងបានហៅគេនៅក្បែរភ្នំតូរប៉ែកខាងស្ដាំ ហើយ យើងធ្វើឱ្យគេមកជិតយើង ដើម្បីនិយាយជាមួយគេ។
arabic: وَنَٰدَيۡنَٰهُ مِن جَانِبِ ٱلطُّورِ ٱلۡأَيۡمَنِ وَقَرَّبۡنَٰهُ نَجِيّٗا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wanādaynāhu min jānibi al-ṭūri al-aymani waqarrabnāhu najiyyan
